item.description:
Come out and be the lead singer in a real band. The Jukebox Heroes provide Live Band Karaoke at the TP Scoreboard in Woburn (It's attached to the Holiday Inn Express right next to Showcase Cinemas near Rte-38 and I-95.)

The TP Scoreboard is a sports bar. So, be 21 or older and bring your identification. There is no cover charge.

Instead of words on a TV screen, you get the lyrics on a sheet of paper. It helps to be very familiar with the song you choose. The live band plays a rendition which is quite true to the artist who made the song famous. Some singers choose to perform a song that they know by heart so that they don't need to refer to the lyrics sheet.

It's lots of fun and very different from your run-of-the-mill karaoke club. So, c'mon and give it a try. Your adrenaline will be glad you did.

Check out the current song list (100 songs) at http://www.meetup.com/bostonkaraoke/messages/24411292/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup placard on our table
item.name: Sing karaoke with a live band
